channel.title: What Should I Make My Broken Xbox 360 Into?
channel.description:
ok so to make a long story short, i got the 3 rings (just like everyone else) so i bought a new xbox and blah blah blah, ok so now i was wondering what i should make my old xbox into. What i mean is im going to take it apart and make it into somthing else
Any Suggestions?

item.title: What Should I Make My Broken Xbox 360 Into?
item.dc:creator: Omega_Absolute
item.description:
I say combine all the ideas here:

Xbox360/ps3/toaster/aquarium/snes/media center!

Read full topic

item.title: What Should I Make My Broken Xbox 360 Into?
item.dc:creator: Marb
item.description:
FireTime:

whats wrong with it. I haven’t dome many fixes on the original apart from replacing blown Xbox Fuses

It shuts off randomly, but it’s not the dreaded power cord/CB-solder issue. If you have any suggestions, you can PM me rather than us cluttering this thread anymore than it already is

Read full topic

but seriously, Pyro says make it into a bong. Because pyro smokes weed.

item.title: What Should I Make My Broken Xbox 360 Into?
item.dc:creator: Lolipopman
item.description:
garthbartin:

Fill the inside with plastic and replace part of a side panel with plexi glass. Then put a bunch of water in it with some goldfish.

When my flatscreen brakes, I’ll try that :retard:

Read full topic

DUDE!!! IM GUNNA DO THAT!!!

I suggest you make a computer with call the parts in plastic clear cases and put them inside an aquarium, that way you can actually have fish in it.

item.description:

item.title: What Should I Make My Broken Xbox 360 Into?
item.dc:creator: FireTime
item.description:
as bad as that sounds that is not too far off of one of the style of 360 fixes that we do as a last ditch effort.

I still recommend the “home made” Hybrid fix. Also skip the steps that tell you to use credit card strips and just make sure you tighten the screws evenly. also foil modand cpu fan can increase the longevity of a 360 that has been repaired.

Read full topic
item.source: What Should I Make My Broken Xbox 360 Into?

item.source: What Should I Make My Broken Xbox 360 Into?

item.title: What Should I Make My Broken Xbox 360 Into?
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
WTF RRoDs are SOO easy to fix… just open it up. See those four rectangular chips positioned near each other? Tape erasers on each of them, unplug the fan. Plug the xbox in and turn it on. Let it overheat for about 15-20 mins, then unplug, take the erasers off and voila, back to normal.

Read full topic
item.source: What Should I Make My Broken Xbox 360 Into?

item.title: What Should I Make My Broken Xbox 360 Into?
item.dc:creator: bulbman
item.description:
My warranty was expired on my 360, I just called support and told them it “clunked out” around christmas and no I’m “stuck” playing the PS3 instead. Actually true, it died about a week after getting my PS3.They repaired it free of charge.

Read full topic
